Candles and Fire

"Science is a candle in the dark." - Carl Sagan

If science is a candle in the dark, philosophy is what lit it - that first spark to explore, the curiosity to shed light on what's real, the drive to find out what there is out there in the universe.

About Me

My name is Jaime. I live outside Washington, DC with my awesome boyfriend Eric and our dog, Harvey Milkbone.

I love science and philosophy, and I'm here to show you that you do too!
